the hash is correct it will return the blockhash of the last header"},"constructor":"constructor, calls snapshot-function when contract get deployed as entry correct by using the calculateBlockheaders function if successfull the last blockhash of the header will be added to the smart contract"},"saveBlockNumber(uint256)":{"notice":"stores a certain blockhash to the state will fail if the block can't be found inside the evm"},"searchForAvailableBlock(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"searches for an already existing
